Package cz.cvut.fel.pjv.data

Class Flight

java.lang.Object
cz.cvut.fel.pjv.data.Flight
public class Flight
extends java.lang.Object
Represents a flight with an airplane and its associated information.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    Flight​(Airport depAirport, Airport arrAirport)
    Constructs a Flight object with the specified departure and arrival airports.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void connectAirplane​(Airplane airplane)
    Connects the airplane to the flight.
    Airplane getAirplane()
    Gets the airplane associated with the flight.
    Airport getArrivalAirport()
    Gets the arrival airport of the flight.
    Airport getDepartureAirport()
    Gets the departure airport of the flight.
    double getDepartureTime()
    Gets the departure time of the flight.
    void changeAirports​(Airport depAirport, Airport arrAirport)
    Changes the departure and arrival airports of the flight.
    void landFlight()
    Handles the landing process of the flight.
    void setDepartureTime​(double departureTime)
    Sets the departure time of the flight.

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Constructor Details

    • Flight

      public Flight​(Airport depAirport, Airport arrAirport)
      Constructs a Flight object with the specified departure and arrival airports.
      Parameters:
      depAirport - the departure airport
      arrAirport - the arrival airport

  • Method Details

    • connectAirplane

      public void connectAirplane​(Airplane airplane)
      Connects the airplane to the flight.
      Parameters:
      airplane - the airplane to connect

    • landFlight

      public void landFlight()
      Handles the landing process of the flight. The airplane lands and is handled at an available terminal at the arrival airport.

    • changeAirports

      public void changeAirports​(Airport depAirport, Airport arrAirport)
      Changes the departure and arrival airports of the flight.
      Parameters:
      depAirport - the new departure airport
      arrAirport - the new arrival airport

    • getAirplane

      public Airplane getAirplane()
      Gets the airplane associated with the flight.
      Returns:
      the airplane

    • getArrivalAirport

      public Airport getArrivalAirport()
      Gets the arrival airport of the flight.
      Returns:
      the arrival airport

    • getDepartureTime

      public double getDepartureTime()
      Gets the departure time of the flight.
      Returns:
      the departure time

    • setDepartureTime

      public void setDepartureTime​(double departureTime)
      Sets the departure time of the flight.
      Parameters:
      departureTime - the departure time to set

    • getDepartureAirport

      public Airport getDepartureAirport()
      Gets the departure airport of the flight.
      Returns:
      the departure airport
